results.content: Great so far. He thoroughly explain each concept with clear examples.
results.content_html: Great so far. He thoroughly explain each concept with clear examples.

results.content:
This course is so good, I am very grateful to the teacher. He taught me jwt in a perfect way, I thought it was very difficult.
An nice to have in this course would be a short code, for example, when we create a new object or when we delete it or when we updated, etc. 
I would buy it again with my eyes closed.
